Text: Why was the last v0.6.1 torrent removed?

I commented on the website, but basically I had some computer trouble. I got everything up and running again from backups, but the backups were corrupt and the torrent client couldn't verify the full ISO. Thus, I had to recreate the ISO and re-up the torrent. Sorry!
sounds interesting. I will d/l and have a look. ty
thanks nice post, and i'ld try this iso

I could not run the CD drive diagnostics - it thought I had none in the system.

It was the device I booted Isow's from, a Lite-On CD/DVD/BD burner, the only 5.25 drive in my system.
Half the claimed features don't work, and the linux mount doesn't work over 80% of the time.  POOP !
